column1: 資料來源： 勞動部勞動關係司。
column10: Source： The Department of Employment Relations, MOL.

column1: 說　　明： 1.本表資料90年以前不含金門縣及連江縣。
column10: Note： 1.Series data exclude Kinmen County and Lienchiang County before 2001.

column1: 2.本表數字係依100年5月1日修訂生效之工會法分類統計。
column10: 2.For statistical figures tabulated in this table, the amended Labor Union Act taking effect on May 1st, 2011 have been referred.

column1: 3.全國勞工工會組織率 = 全體工會會員人數 / 可組織工會人數 × 100。
column10: 3.Organization rate = ( Labor members / The workers having the right to organize labor union ) × 100.
